Detailed Description

template<class AbstractProduct, class Id, class ConsArg, class ProductRef = AbstractProduct *, class IdComp = std::less<Id>>
template<class Product>
class TREX::utils::Factory< AbstractProduct, Id, ConsArg, ProductRef, IdComp >::declare< Product >

Simple producer declaration.

Template Parameters:
Product the real product type

This class is the simplest implementation for a Factory producer. The production is simply calling the constructor of Product accepting ConsArg as an argument.

It is a simple illustration on how a concrete producer can register and be manipulated by a Factory.

This producer wil be available in the Factory during its full lifetime and will automatically unregister on destruction.

Precondition:
Product has a constructor that accepts ConsArg has an argument
Product derives from AbstractProduct
Product is a concrete class (no pute virtual method)
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

template<class AbstractProduct, class Id, class ConsArg, class ProductRef = AbstractProduct *, class IdComp = std::less<Id>>
template<class Product >
TREX::utils::Factory< AbstractProduct, Id, ConsArg, ProductRef, IdComp >::declare< Product >::declare ( id_param  id  )  [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
[in] id An identifier

Create a new instance and declare it to the Factory with the identifier id

Precondition:
The identifier id is not currently declared in the Factory
Exceptions:
MultipleFactoryDecl Another producer has been already declared in the Factory with the identifier id
See also:
Factory::producer::declareMe() const

template<class AbstractProduct, class Id, class ConsArg, class ProductRef = AbstractProduct *, class IdComp = std::less<Id>>
void TREX::utils::Factory< AbstractProduct, Id, ConsArg, ProductRef, IdComp >::producer::declareMe (  )  const [inline, protected, inherited]

Registration to the Factory.

This method registers current instance to the Factory

Precondition:
The identifier of this producer is not currently declared in the Factory
Exceptions:
MultipleFactoryDecl Another producer has been declared in the Factory with the ID of this producer

production operator

Parameters:
[in] arg production argument

Creates a new AbstractProduct using the argument arg.

It calls the virtual method produce which implements the craetion of the new object.

Returns:
A ProductRef to the newly created product
